title: indra jAladavane
sahitya:
indra jAladavane rangayya mahEndra jAladavane


anupallavi

  enndendigivana taLLi beDave namagidarinda heccaLa bArade


caraNam 1    ondu divasa krSNaNu beNNeya kaddu timbenuta bandanu 
bandhisi kONeyoLiTTu gOpi ninna munde hELalu bandene gOpyamma
    caraNam 2    bandhisi tandiTTeve gOpi ninna munde hELa bandeve 
bandhanavanu biDi sendu horadu enna kanda kONali iddane kELamma
    caraNam 3    hAlu mosara kaddane neluvinoLu mElu beNNeya meddane 
bAlana hiDi hiDiyendare rangayya tA jAla turagavEri Odida rangayya
    caraNam 4    aLityana vESadinda rangayya tA magaLa kareya bandane 
halavu bageya upacAragaLanu mADe kelavu divasa iddane kELamma
    caraNam 5    gaNDa heNDira mancavu rangayya tA angaLadoLagiTTane 
puNDarIkAkSana hAvaLIgaLa ninna munde hELabandeve kELamma
    caraNam 6    malagidallige bandane sIreya oLagaNDu biccidane 
kula satiyara vratagaLa keDisida mEle tiLiyitItana bageya kELamma
    caraNam 7    eLedu horage tandeva kolluvaSTaroLa gaNapatiyAdane 
geNadi kELidana suddigaLannu salahuva shrI krSNa puranada viTTala kAyo
